definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

sentences.english: Therefore, they are more suited for playing games like chess.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他們較適合玩像西洋棋這類的遊戲。

sentences.english: Off-camera the movie star liked to play chess.
sentences.chinese: 不拍戲時，那位電影明星喜歡下西洋棋。

sentences.english: They like to play chess in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡在教室下西洋棋。

sentences.english: He's shown enough class for a champion chess player.
sentences.chinese: 他展現了一流西洋棋士的卓越技藝。

sentences.english: Chess, like love, like music, has the power to make men happy. - Tarrasch.
sentences.chinese: 西洋棋，如愛，如音樂，具使人快樂的能力。

sentences.english: Psychologists have sought answers in studies of chess masters.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家在研究了這些西洋棋大師之後，找到了答案。

sentences.english: Armenians play chess in the capital Yerevan last year.
sentences.chinese: 亞美尼亞人去年在首都耶烈萬下著西洋棋。

sentences.english: You cannot play at chess if you are kind-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 如果你善良仁慈，你就不要玩西洋棋。
凱西加入了西洋棋俱樂部。

sentences.english: Yes, I'm very fond of checkers , too.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，我也很喜歡下西洋棋。

definition: Monopoly (game)/known as 地產大亨|地产大亨[Di4 chan3 Da4 heng1] in Taiwan
table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
